nodes.text: Hypermatters is an original short comic story written by J. P. Rutter with art by Will Sliney that was published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.40 and Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine 15.
Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Mace Windu are drawn into a conflict with bounty hunter Volan Das after they receive a distress call from a hypermatter facility in deep space.
